org.apparatus_templi.service

Interface ServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseService, SQLiteDbService, TwitterService

    public interface ServiceInterface
    An interface that all services must implement. Provides methods to start and stop the service as well as a way to notify the service that user preferences related to the service may have changed.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void preferencesChanged()
      Notify the service that preferences have changed.
      void restartService()
      Notify the service that it should restart.
      void stopService()
      Notify the service that it will be stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • preferencesChanged

        void preferencesChanged()
        Notify the service that preferences have changed. The service should re-query the saved preferences for any changes relevant to its environment and adjust behavior as needed.

      • restartService

        void restartService()
        Notify the service that it should restart. The service should save any resources needed and re-initialize.

      • stopService

        void stopService()
        Notify the service that it will be stopped. The service should save any data needed, close all open connections, and refrain from allocating any new resources.
